overview: Be careful what you wish for... you just might get it in the end. Scott thought he'd met his perfect woman in Teri, only to realize that Teri isn't the angel he thought she was... from her strange mix of friends he begins to piece together an elaborate game of identity theft and sexual manipulation and he's the victim... the pawn... the dupe in a carnal chess game that begins... After Midnight.
title: After Midnight
